meanings.definition: A type of dumpling filled with a savory or sweet filling, typically made with unleavened dough.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed the delicious perogis at the party.
meanings.sent2: My grandma makes the best perogis in town.
meanings.sent3: The perogis danced in the boiling water before being served.
meanings.sent4: The perogis were like little flavor-packed pillows.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly cooked perogis filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent2: I learned how to perogis from my mom.
meanings.sent3: He perogised so much that he couldn't move afterwards.
meanings.sent4: She perogised with precision, making each one perfect.
meanings.sent5: The family gathered around the table to perogis together.
